title: Great Quality Caturra
note: intense, with good body and long AT, with most distinct notes of mango and black/red tea. Sweet and balanced cup

company.name: AsisteCampo S.A.S
company.description:
We grow Unique and Exotic coffees.

Asistecampo S.A.S is a group of coffee growers from the Tolima region in Colombia. We have one goal in mind and that is to learn and improve every day the necessary techniques that will allow us to develop the quality of our coffees. We have nano lots of unique coffees, but we also have large quantities of great coffee blends.

coffee.name: Great Quality Caturra
coffee.additionalQualityDescriptors:
Did you know that the average cupping score for the Washed Caturra is 83 points? Well, this is why our beans are so special. The cupping score is 85 and we are working very hard to make it even higher. But that is not all. Our specialty beans have a very low price compared to other offers.

Order your free samples and taste this great and affordable coffee!

company.name: Gujoo Trading PLC
company.description:
Gujoo Trading PLC is established in 2018. We have been exporting Ethiopian green beans to different part of the world. We are one of the national winners of Cup of Excellence in 2021. 
We export all types of coffee Ethiopia has to offer. We are mainly based in Guji, Sidama and Yirgacheffe.

title: Wush Wush Special
note:
Unique and very special, that is how we describe this coffee. There are no words to explain the sensations you feel when you try these amazing beans.

We are Carlos and Kike, brothers and coffee growers. For the past few years, we have been working really hard to develop our fermentation and drying techniques to the point where we can firmly say, that we have achieved almost perfection. But don't take our word for it. This is what Peter from Jame's Gourmet Coffee in UK had to say about our coffee:

"Wow! Your Wush Wush is incredible! We have just cupped it and I bought everything left. Probably in the best 5 coffees that I have tasted this year."
  
So take action and request your samples to taste this amazing coffee! 

If you are located in Europe and are interested in our specialty coffee but can NOT take care of the import process, we will be more than happy to handle that on your behalf and deliver it to your door, as we also have a registered company in Holland.

company.name: AsisteCampo S.A.S
company.description:
We grow Unique and Exotic coffees.

We have one goal in mind and that is to learn and improve every day the necessary techniques that will allow us to develop the quality of our coffees. We have nano lots of unique coffees, but we also have large quantities of great coffee blends.

coffee.name: Wush Wush Special
coffee.additionalQualityDescriptors:
Unique and very special, that is how we describe this coffee. There are no words to explain the sensations you feel when you try these amazing beans.

We grow it at 1.800 MASL in the Colombian Andes. The coffee is fully washed and has a great aroma and flavors. citrus, elegant, strawberry, lime, walnut, mango.

title: Special Offer Robusta Lombok Indonesia
note:
Dear sirs,

I would be happy to introduce our company KAECOFFEE INDONESIA as one of the leading companies providing organic coffee beans from the beautiful land of Indonesia. Our main product is The Natural Process ROBUSTA Lombok which is produced by the farmers at the foot of Rinjani Mountain, the 5th highest mountain in Indonesia (3.726 masl), and representatives of the splendid of 3 Gilis island Gili Trawangan, Gili Air, and Gili Meno.

We have just exhibited our product on the last of September 2021 during the coffee expo in Budapest, Hungary and we would like to share some of the coffees from several origins like Lombok, Bajawa (Flores), Kintamani (Bali), Toraja (Sulawesi), and Gayo (Aceh) to our potential customers that interested in coffee with unique taste and aroma.

Please find us also on our official website: wwww.kaecoffee.com

Should you need more information, please do not hesitate to contact us.  We hope this will be the beginning of a fruitful business relationship in the future.

Thank you and best regards,

I Gede Gotra S
Export Manager
website: www.kaecoffee.com
Instagram: @kaecoffeeindonesia.id
Facebook: Kaecoffee Indonesia
TikTok: @kaecoffee
Mobile (WA) : +62 819 777 122 66

company.name: Kaecoffee Indonesia
company.description: Kaecoffee is a coffee producer from Indonesia dealing with some origins such as Lombok, Gayo, Bajawa, Kintamani, and Toraja. The vision of company is mainly to outsource local people, help orphanage, and contribute to help poor people around.

coffee.name: Robusta Rinjani Lombok Indonesia
coffee.additionalQualityDescriptors:

Preparation: Natural Process 
Growing Altitude : 600-800 masl 
Cupping Notes : 85
Grade : Grade 1
Source : West Nusa Tenggara, Indonesia 
Origin: Lombok

title: Arabica Shade-Grown, Single origin Chikmagalore, 84-85 Cupping score
note:
Coffee grown in the coffee land of Chikmagalore to give you the best cup possible. Grown over the 90 acre Zoya estate, we nurture a Double-layer of shade trees, with aim of improving the cup quality and giving the best possible conditions for the coffee plants. We aim for a Spiritual approach in how we grow.

* Double-layer of indigenous Shade trees.
* Extremely high number of Atti & Basri Trees per acre, drop their wild fruit, acting as organic fertilization and sustenance for fauna, which result in a tropical-Blueberry palate of tasting notes, along with hint of Spice, Bright Acidity and a Floral outlook.
* Pesticide free.
* Golden zone in Western ghats of 1160-1280 msl.
* 80% Women farmers employed.
* Sun Dried.
* Full Traceability, with photographs of each lot.
* Flexible in processing according to your choice.

company.name: Caffeine Nirvana
company.description:
With a Love and passion for Specialty coffee, we aim to give our roasters the best coffee India has to offer.
We believe our coffees have an Unique & exquisite characteristics that are the direct result of the micro-climate & the environment. All our coffees are grown in Thick Double layered shade that make the sunlight almost never touch the ground, along with the mutually beneficial symbiosis with the native flora and fauna that ultimately result in one of the most beautiful and extensively nurtured coffee
We have our own award-winning estate from where  we grow 83+ commercial &  Speciality.

coffee.name: 100% Single origin, Shade-grown Chikmagalore Arabica, 84-85 Cupping score
coffee.additionalQualityDescriptors:
Coffee grown in the coffee land of Chikmagalore to give you the best cup possible. We started growing coffee between 2014 and 2017 with the support of the UNODC program for sustainable alternative development aiming to substitute illicit crop cultivation by new cash crops such as coffee.

coffee.name: Magic Blend SG21 Excelso
coffee.additionalQualityDescriptors:
This is an amazing blend that has been put together in our labs by Miguel, our coffee Wizard with over 20 years of experience. He has found the perfect formula that combines Caturra and Castillo beans, which grow in our farms between 1.750 - 2.000 MASL. Right in the heart of the Colombian Andes.

We came up with this Bled to enable roasters from all over the world to purchase large quantities of some of the best specialty coffees from Colombian at a very affordable price. We can assure you that your clients will absolutely love this blend because of it's amazing dark chocolate - dark fruit, primary flavors. 

Request your samples now and taste this fine coffee!

We Are Producer And Exporter Cooperative Of 700 Small Holder Members Integrating Beekeeping In Arabica Coffee Farms On Stunning Mt Elgon Ecological Landscapes Of Uganda Ranging From 1900 To 2300 M.A.S.L., Origin Districts (Mbale, Bulambuli, Spii-Kapchorwa, Bududa, Manafwa, Namisindwa & Sironko).
We produce Specialty High Quality Coffee Varieties (SL 14, 28, And Bugisu Local/Nyanza Land)And Honey By Investing In Good Quality Practices, Full Traceability, Direct Trade, Based On Organic And Cooperative Principles For Land Restoration, Climate Change Interventions And Social Justice

title: Catur Collection 21-22
note: We have developed a unique post-harvest processing technique for coffee green beans using selected strains of local yeast bacteria that have been proven to increase cupping scores. This will satisfy the demand for better quality and ensure that we are able to oﬀer the same taste proﬁles every harvest year of Indonesian Coffee. This project resulted in the creation of four different processing protocols (Catur Collection): Bumi, Senja, Kamala, Pucuk.

company.name: Catur Coffee Company
company.description: CATUR Coffee Company is co-founded by Mikael Jasin and solely focuses on helping Indonesian coffee producers showcase their coffee beans to the world. The company aims to provide a hassle-free exporting solution to these folks who otherwise lack the platform in getting their coffee across to the larger audience.

coffee.name: Sweet Geisha
coffee.additionalQualityDescriptors:
Geisha is known for its sweet taste and aroma of floral notes, and that is exactly what our coffee has to offer.  We grow this coffee right in the heart of the Colombian Andes at 1.800 MASL and by implementing our fermentation and drying techniques, we make sure that all the qualities and characteristics of this incredible variety are enhanced.

So if what you are looking for is a worthy representative of this variety, then you have come to the right place.

Request your free samples and taste this unique coffee.

company.name: Sorgeba Farmers  Cooperative Union Society
company.description: The Sorgeba Union strives towards becoming a leading producer, processor and exporter of Ethiopian forest, semi-forest and garden coffee of best quality. By linking the member cooperatives to the coffee market, the Union aims at improving the livelihoods of coffee farmers.

coffee.name: ETHIOPA NATURAL FOREST COFFEE
coffee.additionalQualityDescriptors: Hirloom , natural , altitude=1800-2200 m.a.s

title: CAFE DE ESPECIALIDAD  FTO (84-85 PUNTOS EN TAZA)
note: La Cooperativa Agraria Rutas del Inca viene trabajando desde hace 8 años con pequeños agricultores, que se ven beneficiados con un mejor estilo de vida por un pago justo por su producto. En la actualidad la cooperativa cuenta con 300 socios caficultores, los cuales trabajan el café de entre 1,800 - 2,409 m.s.n.m. de un forma orgánica y sostenible. Al desarrollarse el cultivo de altura, este favorece a la formación de un buen grano, que ofrece aromas y sabores únicos de la zona, como limón, manzana/pera, chocolate, dulce, floral, vibrante, cremoso, chocolate de leche, frutas tropicales, jugoso. El café que la organización produce en promedio se logra un puntaje de 85 puntos, que a ello se le adiciona los sellos de FAIRTRADE y Orgánico.

company.name: Cooperativa Agraria Rutas del Inca
company.description: La cooperativa Agraria Rutas del Inca está conformada con 267 socios ubicados en el departamento de Cajamarca, las parcelas se encuentran ubicados a una altura de 1600 msnm a 2400 msnm

coffee.name: CAFE DE ESPECIALIDAD FTO (84-85 PUNTOS EN TAZA)
coffee.additionalQualityDescriptors: Aromas y sabores únicos de la zona, como limón, manzana / pera, chocolate, dulce, floral, vibrante, cremoso, chocolate de leche, frutas tropicales , jugoso.

company.name: Secofet Trading PLC
company.description:
We are legally registered green coffee exporters in Ethiopia under the name of Secofet Trading PLC. Secofet joined the coffee industry in 2020, eying the potentials in the sector. 

As coffee is the primary agricultural export of the country and the livelihood of millions of farmers behind, we do our business professionally and sustainably to contribute the best the coffee value chain requires.

We source our coffee from Gedeo and Sidama regions, the well-known coffee-producing regions of Ethiopia producing Yirgacheffe and Sidama coffees.
